blocks.text: Norway's biggest Champions League night ‚Äî Bod√∏/Glimt host Inter Milan
Bod√∏/Glimt at the Aspmyra ‚Äî in the Champions League Round of 16. Norwegian football has never been here before. Whatever happens tonight, it already counts.
